div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 11:54 am CDT

div.div: Partly sunny, with a high near 65. North wind around 10 mph.
A slight chance of showers between 9pm and 11pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 38. North wind 5 to 10 mph becoming south in the evening. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Sunny, with a high near 70. North wind 5 to 10 mph.
